thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 to reportedly feature 8MP selfie camera with autofocus
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S8 to reportedly feature 8MP selfie camera with autofocus

title: Samsung Galaxy S8 to reportedly feature 8MP selfie camera with autofocus
text:
Samsung Galaxy S8 to reportedly feature 8MP selfie camera with autofocus Samsung Galaxy S8 to reportedly feature 8MP selfie camera with autofocus By - January 16, 2017 “The Galaxy S8 will be the company’s first smartphone to feature an autofocus-enabled selfie shooter” 
In November last year, Etnews had reported that the Samsung Galaxy S8 would flaunt a selfie camera with autofocus capabilities, which is a rarity on smartphones. Now the same publication is back with another report carrying more details about the front shooter of the Galaxy S8. 
The source suggests that the Samsung Galaxy S8 will feature an 8-megapixel front shooter with autofocus and an ultra-thin lens, which will be a first for a Samsung smartphone. The report further suggests that the phone will sport a single primary camera sensor, and not a dual camera setup that’s been suggested by the rumour mill. At least, the prototype has been submitted to the relevant executive doesn’t use the double camera, adds the report. 
In related news, a fresh report by The Investor suggests that the Samsung Galaxy S8 and Apple iPhone 8 will sport the highest level of dust- and water-resistance – IP68 certification. The Galaxy S8 is rumoured to be unveiled on April 18th.
